LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.ClickToConfigure
LocaleResource.Value: To configure the plugin either click HERE or go to Plugins -> Nop Mega Menu -> Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the Mega Menu plugin will be enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Items.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the menu before adding items to it.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Store.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the menu before adding it to stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the name of the menu, which will be visible only in the administration.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.Name.IsRequired
LocaleResource.Value: The menu must have a name

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.CssClass.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This additional CSS class will be added to the menu element. It can be useful for styling purposes.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.ShowDropdownsOnClick.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to show the menu dropdowns on click instead on hover.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.WidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The widget zone where this menu will appear.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.Created
LocaleResource.Value: The menu has been successfully created.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.Updated
LocaleResource.Value: The menu has been successfully updated.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Menu.Deleted
LocaleResource.Value: The menu has been successfully deleted.

LocaleResource.Value: You still do not have any menus created.

LocaleResource.Value: Open link in a new tab

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.MenuItem.MaximumNumberOfSubCategories

LocaleResource.Value: Set the title of the layout

LocaleResource.Value: Choose the type of the layout

LocaleResource.Value: There are no suitable elements! Please add "Columns Layout" menu item first!

LocaleResource.Value: Parent columns layout where this column will be

LocaleResource.Value: There are no suitable elements! Please add "Rows Layout" menu item first!

LocaleResource.Value: Parent rows layout where this row will be

LocaleResource.Value: There are no suitable elements! Please add "Column" menu item first!

LocaleResource.Value: Parent column menu item where this picture will be

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.ItemNotInMenu
LocaleResource.Value: This item is not included in menu

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.SomeCategoriesMayNotBeInMenu
LocaleResource.Value: Some categories setting "Include in top menu" may be disabled

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.Picture.AsMovingMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Picture menu items can be nested only in Columns

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.Picture.AsParentMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Nesting in Picture menu items is forbidden

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.Column.AsMovingMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Column menu items can be nested only in the Columns Layout

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.Column.AsParentMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Layouts menu items cannot be nested in Column

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.Row.AsMovingMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Row menu items can be nested only in the Rows Layout

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.Row.AsParentMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Layouts menu items cannot be nested in Row

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.ColumnsLayout.AsMovingMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Columns layout menu items cannot be nested. They can be top-level menu items only

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.ColumnsLayout.AsParentMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Only Column menu items can be nested in Columns Layout

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.RowsLayout.AsMovingMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Rows layout menu items cannot be nested. They can be top-level menu items only

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.RowsLayout.AsParentMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Only Row menu items can be nested in Rows Layout

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.TemplateBasedMenuItems
LocaleResource.Value: You can not nest (in) Categories, Manufacturers, Vendors, Topics, ProductTags items

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.InvalidNestingMessage.SelectedCatalogDoesNotAllowChildElements
LocaleResource.Value: You can't select this template because it does not allow the menu item to have any child elements or any parent elements!

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.ConfirmationWindow.Text
LocaleResource.Value: Deleting this menu item will result in deleting all of the menu items inside it. Are you sure that you want to proceed?

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.MenuItemTypeTitle.PanelTitle
LocaleResource.Value: Choose wich items to add in your Menu

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.MenuItemTypeTitle.MenuItemsDescription
LocaleResource.Value: You can drag and drop the boxes to rearange your menu links.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.MenuItemTypeTitle.AclDisabledWarning
LocaleResource.Value: In order to use Customer roles functionality you have to disable the following setting: Catalog settings > Ignore ACL rules.
